WaveMain.Story_Announce_IdleTalk_05:

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="40955604c7604d4ab59e1e702abc4d5f" Scale="0.9465479"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Pense à consulter les [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Archives[System:Color name="Default"] de la tablette.
